text: Charles Ellsworth Grapewin (December 20, 1869 â€“ February 2, 1956) was an American vaudeville and circus performer. He was known for playing Uncle Henry in Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer's The Wizard of Oz (1939), Grandpa Joad in The Grapes of Wrath (1940), Jeeter Lester in Tobacco Road (1941), and California Joe in They Died With Their Boots On (1941)."Charles Grapewin Is Dead at 86; Stage Comedian Scored in Movies; Portrayed Jeeter Lester in Film 'Tobacco Road,' Grampa in 'Grapes of Wrath' Was "Pop" in Three Pictures", obituary, "The New York Times", digital archives (1923-present), February 3, 1956. Retrieved January 22, 2014. ==References== Category:1869 births Category:1956 deaths Category:American silent movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:Comedians from Ohio Category:Writers from Ohio Category:Actors from Ohio
title: Charley Grapewin
